title: A Dust Over India | what’s your opinion?
selftext: Although this article is more than 8 years old, what are your thoughts on it? Has anything changed in the last 10 years? I found this article a bit overrated. It is written by the author of ‘The Subtle Art of Not Giving a F*ck,’ Mark Manson.
